column4: Hey guys, what going on? I want to buy a flash drive that I intend to put Linux on (tossup between Ubuntu and Arch) for emergency file recovery, among other things. The flash drive will be used for little else. Anyone know of a fast, reliable model that will fit the bill?
i always wanted to try out IronKey
i have it organized in folders, but I like seeing the album art and putting all the songs on random shuffle
if i knew php, i'd make my own database and web interface, but I can't at the moment
